name: com.unity.services.deployment
description:
The Deployment package allows for a cohesive interface for the deployment of assets and configurations for UGS services.

It is not used on its own as UGS services will integrate with it.
It provides the base tooling, such as the Deployment Window, so that UGS services have shared functionality surrounding the deployment of the service's configuration files.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
- Fixed inspector loading for service assets, below Unity 6

samples.description: This is a simple sample to deploy and call a Remote Configuration.
This is a simple sample to deploy and call a Leaderboard configuration.
This is a simple sample to deploy and call an Economy configuration.
This is a simple sample to deploy and call a Cloud Code Module.
This is a simple sample to deploy and call a Cloud Code Script.
